TextBlock.Text: KASILI: The final node is complete! Now we can move on to the next phase of the project!
MAKALU: Good work team, Everybody did great work!
NELA: No it isn't! The node will leak huge amounts of heat and electricity while charging!
SAMATU: I agree, you and your team did incredible Makalu! I'll make sure to put in a good word with the other project leaders!
SILANA: I'm sorry Nela, but we have to prioritize our few remaining resources on finishing the project on time.
